attributes.action: honour journalist Heather Brooke with a Damehood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Journalist Heather Brooke wrote the seminal ciitizens’ guide to using the Freedom of Information Act and won a High Court case against the House of Commons for the full disclosure of MPs’ second homes allowances.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
